definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: or read to him some of my own writings and been rewarded in return with praise unsparing.
sentences.chinese: 或者給他讀些我寫的作品，都得到了他極大的讚賞。

sentences.english: They can fight for their motherlands and it is wonderful to bring honor.
sentences.chinese: 他們可以爲祖國而戰，這是極大的榮譽。

sentences.english: Despite their many differences, there is a remarkable degree of homogeneity among them.
sentences.chinese: 他們的差異點雖多，但其間亦有極大的同質點。

sentences.english: In fact, it is one that will shake him-and many others-to the core.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，真相讓他和很多人內心深處受到極大震撼。

sentences.english: Time of detection greatly effects melanoma's cure rate.
sentences.chinese: 黑素瘤確診的時間早晚極大地影響着治癒的概率。

sentences.english: Durge would take great satisfaction in being able to kill legions of his sworn enemies.
sentences.chinese: 德奇將從殺死整團整團的死敵中獲得極大的滿足。

sentences.english: Zheng Xiaoying's this awareness has greatly shocked me.
sentences.chinese: 鄭小瑛的這種認識極大地震撼了我。

sentences.english: I have great faith in all of you.
sentences.chinese: 我對你們大家有極大的信心。

sentences.english: Vaccine greatly reduces the number of polio cases.
sentences.chinese: 索克疫苗極大地減少了患病人數。

sentences.english: It is a landscape of enormous complexity, but with enormous opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 這一環境非常複雜，但也蘊涵着極大的機會。

sentences.english: The vast uncontrollability of the environment has a great influence on our pursuit of joy.
sentences.chinese: 環境的不可控極大的影響了我們對於快感的追求。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is suggested that there is a great potential for the ore-search inYongmeihui metallogenic area.
sentences.chinese: 通過對比表明，永海會地區具有極大的找礦前應景。

sentences.english: The retained fetal membranes has caused great ecological damage to the breeding of dairy cows.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛產後胎衣不下對奶牛業造成極大的經濟損失。

sentences.english: Bank of China's subprime exposure significantly hurt the pace of earnings growth last year.
sentences.chinese: 中國銀行的次債風險極大地損害了其去年的收益增長。

sentences.english: I Yuan good at sports, there is great interest in mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 我爰好運動，對數學有極大興趣。

sentences.english: The day is celebrated as Teachers Day in the country with great enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 教師節這一天，全國上下都以極大的熱情來慶祝。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
